pederlib2 0.0.1

Komma

komma.Rd

Komma

Usage

komma(...)

Arguments

...

passed on to scales::comma_format

Value

a function to use in label argument in scales in ggplot2

Examples

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(drat)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = komma()) +
  theme_minimal()
#> `stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value `binwidth`.
